sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; export default function Navbar(mode) { const getStyles = (color, backgroundColor) => { return {color,backgroundColor } } const [styles, setStyle] = useState(getStyles('black','white')) if (mode === 'light') { setStyle(getStyles('white', 'black')) } else if (mode === 'dark') { setStyle(getStyles('black', 'white')) } return (
{/* eslint-disable-next-line jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */} {args.title}
  • {args.about}
  • Link
  • Dropdown
    • Action
    • Another action
    • Something else here
  • {/* eslint-disable-next-line jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */} Disabled
) } Navbar.propTypes={ title : PropTypes.string, about : PropTypes.string, } Navbar.defaultProps={ title : PropTypes.string, about : PropTypes.string, }
